channel.title: Building an extension on Suriya's site
channel.description: Recent content in Building an extension on Suriya's site

item.title: Fixing chrome extension issues
item.description: an Unknown error occured while fetching the script. This happens when trying to load the extension. the manifest.json was pointing to the right service worker but still couldn’t fetch it. The problem was that there was some import error or other issue in the service-worker script. I fixed it and the whole thing loaded like a breeze. Changes failing to load in the page we are testing or no changes Reload the page.
